VICTORY_CONDITIONS: The Russians win at Game End if they Control ≥ five Level 3 hill hexes on Board 2.
SSR: EC are Moderate, with no wind at start.

After "At Start" placement, each German infantry unit must take a TC. The only possible consequence of failure is that the unit must begin the scenario broken. Those units which break during this pre-game TC are not subject to DM in the initial German RPh.
The Germans receive one module of 80+mm Battalion Mortar OBA (HE and Smoke) with the radio in the initial OB.
The Germans receive one module of 100+mm OBA (HE and Smoke) with the Turn 4 reinforcements.

SCENARIO_NOTES.caption: Download the scenario card from Multi-Man Publishing (ASL Classic pack).

OB_SETUPS_1.caption: Set up on any whole hex of Board 3

Enter on Turn 2 on any single road hex
on the east edge of Board 3

Enter on Turn 5 on any single road hex
on the east edge of Board 3

OB_SETUPS_2.caption: Set up in any whole hex of Board 4

Enter on Turn 1 on any single road hex
on any edge of Board 2

Enter on Turn 2 on any single road hex
on the north or south edge of Board 4

Enter on Turn 4 on any single road hex
on the west edge of Board 2

Enter on Turn 5 on any single road hex
along the north, south or west edge of Board 2

Enter on Turn 8 along
the west edge of Board 2
